Articles.Content:
Not sure if this has been suggested, I don't post here a lot, mostly reading threads, think of this as a template to a challenge:

Multiple asteroids all in the same orbit as Mun but they have to be following Mun pretty close to them (so it looks like a trail), but in various sizes from big (the mun) all the way down to the smallest asteroid you can find, I suppose a simple way to prove it would be a screen shot of the star map, if some one wants to make this into a challenge, go for it, I have no idea just an imagination
